#summary Grid code overview.

Japan's government utilize [http://www.stat.go.jp/data/mesh/ grid square mesh code] for census and other purposes. The specificateion is documented as JIS C 6304, and revised to JIS X 0410. NTT DoCoMo use modified version of that grid code for [http://www.nttdocomo.co.jp/service/imode/make/content/iarea/domestic/index.html Open i-Area in Japan].

Base grid size is about 1km. Below shows various grid sizes.
